honors_and_awards.title: Special Mention - Technology
honors_and_awards.description: Awarded for the excellent contribution in the field of Technology throughout the 4 years of study at IIT Kharagpur

honors_and_awards.title: Inter IIT Tech Meet 11.0 | Jaguar Land Rover | Robotic charging for EVs | Silver
Inter IIT Tech Meet 10.0 | Jaguar Land Rover | Powered bonnet for electric vehicle | Gold
honors_and_awards.description: Secured Gold in designing of Powered bonnet for electric vehicle challenge among participating IITs competing from all over India • Proposed and designed a 3R-1P mechanism to automate the opening, holding and closing of the bonnet satisfying the dimensional and time constraints • Performed Electro-mechanical system modelling in Simscape and Simulink and parameterised models using MATLAB script, thus ensuring modularity

honors_and_awards.title: Formula Bharat Virtuals 2022 | Combustion Vehicle Category | Winners
honors_and_awards.description: Worked on engineering design, overall cost, marketability, and dynamic performance of Formula Student combustion vehicle • Secured the first position in the overall event with a score of 264.19/275 in the combustion vehicle category among 33 formula student teams across India • Won the Engineering Design event with a total score of 200/200 and the award for the best powertrain package backed by the new electronic gear shifte

honors_and_awards.title: Country topper (Vanyajeeva ratana award)

honors_and_awards.description: Honored with "Vanyajeeva ratna swarn padak" for first position in the country in "Vanyajeeva ratna award" examination conducted by"Indian centre for wildlife and environmental studies in south east region".
